name: 1,000 Rudolphs
description:
1,000 Rudolphs

Santa Claus tried to clone Rudolph to increase the speed of his sleigh but he messed up real bad. Now only he can exterminate his failed experiments; all 1,000 of them!

Controls

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Look

SPACE - Jump

LMB - Fire

RMB - Zoom in (Sniper only)

Q - Swap Weapons

Credits

Game created by Kevin Fischer.

Music

Lobo Loco - Summoner of Winter

Vitamen Pets - Christmas Song

Bugs and Rats - Merry Christmas

Sound Effects

Mike Koenig & Kibblesbob

Models

commander566, renderpig, glDev, WilliamJ99, & alialsamarei

Unity Packages

Bezier Solution - yasirkula

DOTween - Demigiant

Skybox Series Free - Avionx
